verses.verse: Concerning the spiritual things, brothers, I don't want you to be unaware.
You realize that you were non-Jews being led away to the idols, the voiceless ones, whenever you were being led.
For this reason, I am making known to you that no one speaking in God's Spirit says, "Jesus is doomed," and no one is able to say, "Jesus is the Master," except in the Sacred Spirit.
There are varieties of gifts, but the same Spirit.
And there are varieties of serving tasks and the same Master.
And there are varieties of activities, but the same God is the One being active all in all.
The showing of the Spirit is given to each person toward what is advantageous.
You see, there is a person to whom a message of insight certainly is given through the Spirit; but to another, a message of information in line with the same Spirit;
to a different person, trust in the same Spirit; but to another, gifts of cures in the same Spirit;

but to another, activities of abilities; but to another, preaching; but to another, discernments of spirits; but to a different person, families of languages; but to another, interpretation of languages.
With all these, the one and the same Spirit is active, divvying out to each individually just as He intends.
You see, exactly as the body is one and has many body parts, but all the body parts of the body, the one body, being many, are one body, so also is the Anointed King;
for also in one Spirit, we all were submerged into one body, whether Jewish people, or Greeks, or slaves, or free. And we all were given a drink into one Spirit.
You see, also the body is not one body part, but many.
If the foot said, "Because I am not a hand, I am not from the body," it is not, beside this, not from the body.
And if the ear said, "Because I am not an eye, I am not from the body," it is not, beside this, not from the body.
If the whole body is an eye, where is the hearing of the ear? If the whole is hearing of the ear, where is the sense of smell?
But right now God placed the body parts, each one of them, in the body just as He wanted.
If it was all one body part, where is the body?
Now it is certainly many body parts, but one body.
An eye is not able to say to the hand, "I have no need of you," or again the head to the feet, "I have no need of you."
But much more, the body parts of the body seeming to be weaker are essential.
And parts that seem to us to be more worthless, we place much more value around these parts of the body, and our improper parts have much more properness.
Our proper parts have no need, but God mixed the body together, after giving much more value to the person that lacks
so that there may not be a split in the body, but the body parts may have the same concern over each other.
And if one body part suffers, all the body parts suffer together with it. If a body part is made magnificent, all the body parts are happy together with it.
You all are a body of the Anointed King, body parts from a part of it,

and whom God certainly placed in the assembly: first, missionaries; second, preachers; third, teachers; following that, abilities; after that, gifts of cures, assists, counselings, families of languages.
Not all are missionaries, are they? Not all are preachers, are they? Not all are teachers, are they? Not all are abilities, are they?
Not all have gifts of cures, do they? Not all speak with languages, do they? Not all thoroughly interpret, do they?
But be impassioned about the gifts, the better gifts, and yet I am showing you an even better way.
